name: Faustina Yarathingal
summary: She builds clean, functional web apps and has a background in forensic science, digital forensics, and crime scene examination.

projects.name: Personal Portfolio Website
projects.description: A responsive personal portfolio website showcasing my projects, skills, and background. Designed with a clean UI and smooth navigation to give recruiters a quick but complete overview of my work.

projects.name: Landing Page
projects.description: A modern, responsive landing page built with a focus on layout, typography, and visual hierarchy. Optimized for both desktop and mobile viewing.

projects.name: To-Do App
projects.description: A functional to-do list application that allows users to add, delete, and manage tasks. Built to practice state management, user input handling, and clean UI logic.

projects.name: Weather App
projects.description: A weather application that fetches real-time weather data from a public API and displays current conditions in a simple, user-friendly interface.

projects.name: Mini Docs
projects.description: A real-time collaborative document editor supporting multiple users. Features include live cursors, presence indicators, theming, and real-time synchronization.

projects.name: AI Chatbot
projects.description: An AI chatbot designed to function as a portfolio-aware guide. The chatbot can handle file and image uploads while also understanding and explaining my projects, skills, and technical background. It features a polished chat UI, persistent conversation handling, and a custom backend that injects structured portfolio context into AI responses. Built with React + TypeScript using a modular AI layer designed for future OpenAI integration.

strengths: Ability to explain technical concepts clearly
Analytical mindset influenced by forensic studies
